headline: Morgan Stanley Explores Crypto Custody While Shares Trade Near Fair Value
summary: Morgan Stanley (NYSE:MS) has applied for a national trust charter focused on digital asset custody and services. The charter would allow the bank to directly hold client digital assets and provide related services under federal oversight. The move marks a new step in the bank’s build out of regulated cryptocurrency infrastructure for institutional and wealth management clients. Morgan Stanley is already a major player in wealth management and institutional services, and this digital asset...
